edu.ncsu.csc216.androtech.model.devices

Class DeviceList

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.androtech.model.devices.DeviceList

  • public class DeviceList
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a linked list of devices awaiting service from the repair center
    Version:
    1.0 (March 24, 2015)
    Author:
    Adams Ombonga (amombong)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeviceList()
      Constructor method for device list that accepts no parameters and creates an empty device list
      DeviceList(java.util.Scanner scan)
      Constructor method for device list that accepts scanner as a parameter and uses the information found in the scanner to populate the list

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Device deviceToAdd)
      This method adds the specified device to the linked list, regardless of the insertion point, and instead based on it's tier and the tier of the devices it will be added next to
      java.lang.String filteredList(java.lang.String filter)
      Method which uses the specified filter to find all devices that match the prefix and creates a string showing only these devices, called filteredList.
      SimpleIterator<Device> iterator()
      Method used to determine the first point of the list as well as return a cursor that can be used to easily traverse the linked list
      Device remove(java.lang.String filter, int position)
      Remove method that accepts a filter and positon as a parameter, using these parameters it determines where in a list the item to be removed is and removes it

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeviceList

        public DeviceList(java.util.Scanner scan)
        Constructor method for device list that accepts scanner as a parameter and uses the information found in the scanner to populate the list
        Parameters:
        scan - scanner containing the passed text file.

      • DeviceList

        public DeviceList()
        Constructor method for device list that accepts no parameters and creates an empty device list

    • Method Detail

      • iterator

        public SimpleIterator<Device> iterator()
        Method used to determine the first point of the list as well as return a cursor that can be used to easily traverse the linked list
        Returns:
        SimpleIterator with type Device

      • remove

        public Device remove(java.lang.String filter,
                     int position)
        Remove method that accepts a filter and positon as a parameter, using these parameters it determines where in a list the item to be removed is and removes it
        Parameters:
        filter - filter used to match only certain devices based on their name
        position - index indicating where the device is in the filtered list.
        Returns:
        the device being removed.

      • add

        public void add(Device deviceToAdd)
        This method adds the specified device to the linked list, regardless of the insertion point, and instead based on it's tier and the tier of the devices it will be added next to
        Parameters:
        deviceToAdd - the device being added to the linked list

      • filteredList

        public java.lang.String filteredList(java.lang.String filter)
        Method which uses the specified filter to find all devices that match the prefix and creates a string showing only these devices, called filteredList.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter string used to sort the enter list
        Returns:
        filteredList the string of the devices that match the filter.
